title: Average YouTube video length 2018 , by category
summary: This is a bar chart representing Youtube Category in the x axis and Average length in minutes in the y axis.
The maximum Average length in minutes 24.7 is found at Youtube Category Gaming and the minimum is found at Music where Youtube Category is 6.8.
There is a difference of 17.9 between the maximum Youtube Category Gaming and minimum Youtube Category Music.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average length in minutes for 7 number of Youtube Categorys.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Youtube Category in the x axis and Average length in minutes in the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The highest Youtube Category Gaming has 17.9 more Average length in minutes than the lowest Youtube Category Music.
Average length in minutes at Youtube Category Gaming is 24.7 , second place is  at 24.7, and thirdly is Entertainment at 12.9.
The highest value 24.7 at Gaming is almost 1.86 times larger than the average value 13.31.
